meanings: Noun 드레스, 원피스 (→cocktail dress, evening dress, sundress)
Noun 옷 (→evening dress, fancy dress, headdress, morning dress)
A shortened form of E-mail Address

examples.korean: Her wedding dress was stitched by hand. 발음듣기 그녀의 웨딩드레스는 손으로 바느질한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her wedding dress was stitched by hand. 발음

examples.korean: The bride’s dress trailed behind her. 발음듣기 신부의 드레스가 뒤로 끌렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bride’s dress trailed behind her. 발음

examples.korean: Her dress caught alight in the fire. 발음듣기 그녀의 드레스에 불길이 옮겨 붙었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her dress caught alight in the fire. 발음

examples.korean: a daring strapless dress in black silk 발음듣기 검은 실크 소재의, 어깨 끈이 없는 대담한 드레스 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a daring strapless dress in black silk 발음

examples.korean: Her dress had split along the seam. 발음듣기 그녀의 드레스는 솔기를 따라 길게 찢어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her dress had split along the seam. 발음
